init_hook:
function __log_echo() {
  if [[ "${REPO_SCRIPT_DEBUG-1}" == "1" ]]; then
    echo "$1"
  fi
}
__log_echo "━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━"
__log_echo "  Initializing Devbox: Node.js"
__log_echo "━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━"


__log_echo " ➜ NODE_VERSION: $(node -v)"
__log_echo " ➜ PNPM_VERSION: $(pnpm -v)"
__log_echo " ➜ DENO_VERSION: $(deno --version)"
